pages.text: $(li)The Bowl is a simple wood liquid container.$(br)$(li)If you right click a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/mooshroom)Mooshroom$(/l) while you are holding a Bowl, you will obtain a $(l)Mushroom Stew$() or $(l)Suspicious Stew$().

$(li)They are used to create a lot of different food recipes in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(br2)$(l) Bowl Recipes$() $(li)Ice Cream$(li)Soups$(li)Stews$(li)Scrambled Eggs$(li)Truffle Mash$(li)Pudding$(li)Adzuki Curry
